ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] hi
ygData.msgSnippet: *bows to the shaman in respect* your talents are many however... your pet would be no match for hers, even if you slow it and she can dot and life spike you
ygData.messageBody:
*bows to the shaman in respect*

your talents are many however...
your pet would be no match for hers, even if you slow it
and she can dot and life spike you and heal her self as she goes
thats minus hp for you , plus hp for her
if she has done her research , i believe she can root too
necromancer pet is strong enough to qualify as a tank, second only to the mage's pet

IMHO of course


nomiea winterwolf
59 druid, xev
----- Original Message -----
From: costa leo
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, January 16, 2003 4:51 PM
Subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] hi


hi guys,

i believe my shammy would win over her necro. due to
the fact that i can root her, give myself regen, and
dot her with a crap load of dot and poison spells.
plus our pets can duel it out while i watch her die
ever so slowly.
Qbano Boofmiester
Druzzil Ro
